pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Arrow' Database Connectivity ('ADBC') 'SQLite' Driver // Provides a developer-facing interface to the 'Arrow' Database Connectivity ('ADBC') 'SQLite' driver for the purposes of building high-level database interfaces for users. 'ADBC' https://arrow.apache.org/adbc/ is an API standard for database access libraries that uses 'Arrow' for result sets and query parameters.
